Posts.Content: kdat1661 wrote: I am waiting to get a needle biopsy done next week. Went for a regular mammogram and they found a cluster of micros. Went back for additional xrays, coming back as suspicious. I'm only 48 so I am freaked out a little bit. At least they are getting the tests done quickly. Log in to post a reply
